Description: I designed the official Gelato House Franchise Ltd online ordering application during a four-month project. As a result of comprehensive user research, I developed a four-step user flow in which users can customize and order their unique ice cream. I used Adobe Illustrator for graphic design, also Figma for UI design and prototyping.

This website is my pride, built from scratch with React. I used React's component-based system to optimize its performance. The graphics were made in Adobe Illustrator, while I designed the user interface using Figma. To ensure smooth browsing across different devices and screen sizes, I followed responsive design principles throughout development.

I redesigned Twilight Clinic's website with a focus on a simple, elegant, and clean interface. After a comprehensive landscape analysis, I designed the UI in Figma. Then I developed the website using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Tried my best to use coding practices, like custom properties and utility classes for long-term maintainability.

I redesigned the Flystein portal landing page after an in-depth competitor analysis and review of published articles on user behavior in the travel industry. I attempted to use the data provided in the publications to present a new design approach. I used Adobe XD and Photoshop respectively for UI and graphic design.
